snippet.title: Farmagia | Extended Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Take a stand to free the people in an epic tale of rebellion and friendship!

Marvelous and Hiro Mashima, creator of Fairy Tail, Edens Zero, Rave Master, and Dead Rock, team up to present a brand-new adventure full of frantic monster combat and rewarding farming simulation. 

Find out more on: 
Web: https://marvelousgames.com/games/farmagia
Twitter: https://twitter.com/marvelouseurope
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/marvelouseurope
Instagram: https://instagram.com/marvelouseurope
